query.sql: SELECT '单选','单选' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '复选','复选' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '下拉框','下拉框' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '左右选择','左右选择' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'custom','custom' FROM DUAL

query.sql: SELECT 'eq','等于(=)' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'between','范围(between)' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'in','in' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'notin','notin' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'noteq','不等于(!=)' FROM DUAL

query.sql: select 'LEFT','左对齐' from dual union select 'CENTER','居中' from dual union select 'RIGHT','右对齐' from dual union select 'JUSTIFIED','自动调整' from dual
query.name: c_alignment

query.sql: select 'LEFT','左对齐' from dual union select 'CENTER','居中' from dual union select 'RIGHT','右对齐' from dual union select 'JUSTIFIED','自动调整' from dual
query.name: c_group_alignment

query.name: bug_type

query.sql: SELECT c_id ,c_name FROM t_blogd_level ORDER BY c_sort_id
query.name: bug_level

query.sql: SELECT f.c_id ,f.c_name,m.c_id,m.c_name FROM t_blogd_forum f LEFT JOIN t_blogd_module m ON m.c_forum_id = f.c_id ORDER BY f.c_sort_id,m.c_sort_id
query.name: bug_forum_module

query.sql: SELECT 'doc','doc' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'docx','docx' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'xlsx','xlsx' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'xls','xls' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'pdf','pdf' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'png','png' FROM DUAL

query.sql: SELECT '有意愿' AS id, '有意愿' AS NAME FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '无意愿' AS id, '无意愿' AS NAME FROM DUAL UNION SELECT '未知' AS id, '未知' AS NAME FROM DUAL

query.sql: select c_version,c_version from t_dict_version WHERE c_product='RIIL' order by c_version asc
query.name: Riil版本

query.sql: select c_version,c_version from t_dict_version WHERE c_product='BMC' order by c_version asc

query.sql: SELECT c_customer_id,SUM(c_money) FROM t_project WHERE c_customer_id =%{#t_customer.c_id} GROUP BY c_customer_id

query.sql: SELECT 0, '否' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 1, '是' FROM DUAL
query.name: 是否

query.sql: SELECT CAST(c_id as CHAR(36)),c_full_path_name FROM t_rpt_type ORDER BY c_full_path_name
query.name: rpt_def_type_id

query.sql: SELECT c_id,c_name FROM t_rptd_display_type order by c_sort_id
query.name: rpt_def_display_type_id

query.sql: SELECT 'Horizontal','水平' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'Vertical','垂直' FROM DUAL
query.name: rpt_def_chart_orientation

query.sql: SELECT 'AREA','区域图' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'STACKEDAREA','堆叠区域图' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'BAR','条形图' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'BAR3D','3D条形图' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'LAYEREDBAR','气泡条形图' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'WATERFALLBAR','瀑布图' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'STACKEDBAR','堆叠图' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'STACKEDBAR3D','3D堆叠图' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'GROUPEDSTACKEDBAR','分组堆叠图' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'LINE','折线图' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'PIE','饼图' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'PIE3D','3D饼图' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'TIMESERIES','时间序列图' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'DIFFERENCE','差异图' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'XYAREA','XYAREA区域' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'XYBAR','XYBAR条形' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'XYLINE','XYLINE线图' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'XYSTEP','XYSTEP' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'SCATTER','SCATTER散点图' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'MULTI_AXIS','MULTI_AXIS' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'SPIDER','SPIDER蜘蛛' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'XYBLOCK','XYBLOCK' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'BUBBLE','气泡图' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'CANDLESTICK','蜡烛图' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'HIGHLOW','HIGHLOW' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'METER','仪表图' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'THERMOMETER','温度计' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'GANTT','甘特图' FROM DUAL
query.name: c_chart_type_chart_type

query.sql: SELECT c_field,IFNULL(c_display_name,c_field) FROM t_rpt_def_field f WHERE c_rpt_def_id =%{#t_rpt_def.c_id}
query.name: c_chart_x

query.sql: SELECT c_field,IFNULL(c_display_name,c_field) FROM t_rpt_def_field f WHERE c_rpt_def_id =%{#t_rpt_def.c_id}

query.sql: SELECT c_field,IFNULL(c_display_name,c_field) FROM t_rpt_def_field f WHERE c_rpt_def_id =%{#t_rpt_def.c_id}
query.name: c_chart_value

query.sql: select 'none','不显示' from dual union select 'all','大排行' from dual union select 'page','每页独立行号' from dual union select 'column','列排行' from dual
query.name: c_row_number_type

query.sql: SELECT p.c_id,d.c_name FROM t_rpt_def_period p INNER JOIN t_rptd_period_type d ON p.c_period_type_id=d.c_id INNER JOIN t_rpt r ON r.c_rpt_def_id =p.c_rpt_def_id WHERE r.c_id=%{#t_rpt.c_rpt_def_id} ORDER BY d.c_sort_id
query.name: rpt_period_def_period_id

query.sql: SELECT t.c_id,t.c_name FROM t_rptd_period_type t INNER JOIN t_rpt_def_period p ON p.c_period_type_id= t.c_id WHERE p.c_rpt_def_id=%{#t_rpt.c_rpt_def_id} ORDER BY t.c_sort_id
query.name: c_period_type_id
